inn1.comm: on a length, on the middle and leg and Butt tries to flick it to the on side, the ball straightens and he gets a leading edge to cover point.
on a length again, on the middle stump line and Akmal pushes it to the on side
flashed in the air towards third man. It was slightly short of length and a tad outside off stump, Akmal stays where he is and pushes it away over gully
length delivery just outside off stump, Salman stays adjacent to the line and taps it down to third man
just short of length, around that off stump and Akmal pushes it to the off side
it lands on a length around off and curls away, left alone by Akmal.
That grunt again and a probing lifting delivery outside off stump. Salman sways away from the line.

goes slightly wide of the crease and hurls a full delivery on the leg and middle - you can see that he wanted to cut it back in but started off with a wrong line- and Salman Butt whips it to deep square leg boundary
appeal for an lbw decision. It landed short of length, outside leg stump and hit him on the pads as well
on a length, around off and middle and Salman Butt leans forward to defend it down the track
lovely delivery, curling in towards middle stump line, trying to trap him lbw but Salman takes out the front leg just in time, brings his bat down in time and pushes it to the mid-on region
now he drifts to the hips and tucked to fine leg for a single.
again on that leg and middle line, turned to square leg.
fuller, swings in but again on the leg and middle line and is worked past square leg. It will get interesting if he can get it curve back in from off and middle
tries to take it away but lands short of length and is cut hard to Mahmudullah at point
a tad fuller and is pushed to point
a slower one, on the middle and off and defended to the off side
length delivery on the middle and off and Salman pushes it cautiously to the off side.
short of length, outside off, cut hard to right of point where Roqibul makes a fine diving stop and the crowd love his effort.
slower one, full and on the middle, turned between midwicket and mid-on for a quick single and the throw is wide of the mark.
on the off stump, from a length, no room there but Salman stays adjacent to the line and opens the bat face to cut it to point. Akmal wants a run, Salman says no
banged in short and Salman Butt brings up the second four of the match with an mistimed pull. It went higher than he thought but landed safely, one bounce over the rope
short-of-length delivery moving towards off stump and is pushed to point.
short , outside off, line and length both wrong and Salman Butt crashes it through the cover point.
leans forward to push a full length delivery to mid-off
IPl time for Akmal: he walks across the stumps and swings a full-length delivery on middle to long leg.
on a length, on the middle and Salman defends to the leg side.
lands on a length, on the middle, cuts away and is tapped to backward point.
another one moving away from Salman, who unlike many subcontinental batsmen, gets his bat into a horizontal position and taps to backward point
on the pads, tucked behind square leg
leans forward to defend a length delivery to the on side
just over covers. Almost caught by Mahmudullah. Fullish, well outside off stump and Salman goes down on his knee to flash in the air and over the jumping lunging fielder
steers to backward point
slower one, on the middle and off stump line, Salman is touch unsure, pushes the bat at the ball and gets a inside edge
just outside off stump, coming in from short of length and Akmal stands tall to force it to point region
fuller, on the off stump line, Akmal shuffles a touch and drives inside-out to left of mid-off
slips down leg side and Salman Butt tickles it fine. Very fine.
leans forward to defend a length delivery on the middle stump line, down the track
another boundary. He created his own line by staying adjacent to the line, beside the line of the delivery just outside off stump and late cut it. It could be a risky thing on tracks with more life.
shuffles a touch and opens the bat-face and runs it to backward point
strays to the leg stump line, tucked straight to square leg.
slower one, full and Salman Butt leans forward, waits for the ball before pushing it to extra cover for a quick single
Slap, wham, bang. Over pitched, well outside off and Salman goes down on his knee to drill it through extra cover.
flash and a miss but it's a wide.
short of length delivery kicking up, Butt adjusts to defend it down the track.
leans across to push a full length delivery to the off side.
bangs it short and Salman Butt spanks it past midwicket. Two fours already in this over.
slower one ends up as a low full toss, placed to left of mid-on for a single
fuller, better length and just outside off stump, defended to point.
on a length, on the middle and pushed to the leg side
Akmal decides to join in the fun. He walks across the stumps and swings a full delivery on the off stump to deep midwicket region
full in length, on the middle stump line, driven to mid-on
slower one, pretty full, Akmal waits and pushes it along the ground to mid-on
just outside off stump, full in length, carved  to third man
another change of pace, cutting away from Salman Butt who decides late to cut it and gets a bottom edge on to the ground and it rolls away to the 'keeper
almost gets a wicket off his first ball. The joy and then the agony. Short of length, outside off stump and Akmal went hard at it, the ball came on slow to him and he got a nick past the off stump
fuller, on the middle and driven to mid-on. Rahim, the 'keeper, shouts words for the encouragement to the debutant.

lovely shot from Akmal. Sid Ravindran, writing the bulletin and sitting next to me, purrs like a cat  in excitement. It was a tad short of length and Akmal stood tall to punch it off the back foot through covers.
leans forward to turn to the leg side
length delivery outside off stump, pushed to cover point
full and outside off stump, holding its line, Akmal slices it off the thickish outside edge to third man.
tossed up full, lots of air, on the middle and leg, pushed to the off side

Thuderous six over long-off. He didn't charge down the track but just biffed it thrillingly over the ropes. It was another flighted delivery and full, Akmal took out the front leg out of the line and knifed it up and over
leans forward to off drive for a single
width offered outside off stump and Salman Butt leans across to square drive through cover point
comes forward to push back to the bowler
turns in towards off stump, mistimes a punch down the track
bangs it in short as he sees Akmal walk down the track and its pulled past square leg
fullish, on the middle and leg, whipped past square leg. Wrong line from the young man, who bowls mediumpace.
lands it on a nagging length, around off and middle, denying Salman any room that he desires, and pushed to the off side
a tad short of length and whipped past square leg
elegant straight drive from Akmal, the bowler lunges to his right, misses the ball which crashes into the sticks at the other end

Sharp acrobatic catch from Rahim, the keeper. It was full, outside off stump and Akmal, rooted to the crease, drove hard and got a thick outside edge. The ball was traveling really fast to right of Rahim who dived to pluck it safely.

Younis is run out. It spun in towards middle stump, worked to right of midwicket where Raqibul Hussai moved quickly, dived to his right to make the stop and threw at the stumps at the non-striker's ends. Razzak collected the ball in front of the stumps and broke the stumps quickly. Gone! Two in two balls. Bangladesh are getting back in to the game courtesy some fab fielding. First Rahim and now Raqibul.
turned past midwicket to bring up his eight ODI fifty. He loves Bangladesh and Indian attacks.
turns down leg side and it's a wide
loopy delivery on the middle, driven back to the bowler
outside off stump, full, driven to covers.
And he almost gets one as this one turns past the forward prod .
leans forward to defend to the off side
short of length, on the hips, turned to the leg side for a single.

slightly short of length, punched to covers and there could have been another run out as Shahriar Nafees pulls of a fine diving stop to his left at covers but couldn't pick the ball cleanly and release it early and Yousuf scrambles back home.
uppish on drive for a boundary. Yousuf went through the line, ball stopping on him a touch and it flew to the right of the bowler, past the non-striker
short delivery and Yousuf swivels off the front foot to pull it over midwicket
straying down leg side and Yousuf picks it up to left of long leg for couple of runs
another one that stops on Yousuf a touch and he gets a inside edge on to the pads as he tries to drive on the up.
leans forward to push a turning delivery to mid-on
spins in towards pads, turned to backward square leg
leans across to defend to covers
outside off, spins in and Butt is hit on the pad outside off stump, trying to defend
picks up a single with a sweep shot and another good stop at Dolar Mehmud at long leg
on the leg stump line, flicked to fine leg
fullish, outside off stump, Butt shapes to drive and as is his wont , that bottom hand works over time but he goes a tad hard at this one and gets an inside edge t o the leg side
cuts in sharply from outside off stump, Yousuf leans across to defend and is struck just outside off
fuller, just outside off and Yousuf leans forward to defend
full and outside off, pushed to the off side
charges down the track, Dolar drags back the length a touch and Yousuf gets an inside edge on his heave and it rolls to midwicket
short of length, on the middle and off, turned past square leg
leans forward to defend a delivery that was slow through the air and turned in from outside off
sweeps from outside off for a single
driven to the off side
Rahim appeals for a catch, turned down. It spun in from outside off, beat the waft across the line and bobbed up off the pad and Rahim came in front of the stumps to take it. No bat.
works with the spin, past square leg
almost yorked! It was well-flighted one that dipped in really full, on the middle and leg line, Yousuf jammed his bat down in time to keep it out.
just outside the off stump, pushed to covers

What a ripper from round the stumps! It's definitely taking some turn here .It drifted in from that angle, landed on middle, sucking Salman forward before turning past the outside edge and the off stump.
the 100 is up with a flick. 17.3 overs. THis is a 40-0ver game
outside off stump, turning in, tried to reverse sweep but doesn't connect well
short, down leg side - his first poor delivery of the over - and Yousuf pulls it to deep square leg boundary.
slow through the air, just outside off, swept away for a single
outside the off stump, Yousuf lunges forward and defends it to dover
fuller on the middle stump line, Yousuf pushes it to long on to swap ends
on the leg stump, Butt turns it to short fine leg
on the leg and middle, Butt moves across a touch and pushes it on the leg side to pick up a single
fuller upto the batsman, pushes it to mid on to retain the strike
short on the middle stump, Yousuf moves back a touch and pushes it to mid on for a single
wide down the leg side
fuller on the leg stump, Butt stands tall and pushes it to long on for an easy single
outside the off stump, Yousuf moves across and turns it away to fine leg for a single
hits the good length as Butt defends it on the frontfoot
outside the off stump, Butt powers it through covers for a single
fuller on the middle stump, Yousuf pushes it to long on to face the first ball of the next over
short to begin with as Yousuf cuts it square to point
wide down the leg side
short outside the off stump, Yousuf cuts it to cover
short in length and devoid of any turn as Yousuf rocks back and pushes it past midwicket to pick a boundary
goes back to punch drive past covers
topspinner on the middle, turned to the leg side
worked to the on side for a single now
from round the stumps, around off stump, fisted to long-on for a single.
from over the stumps for right-handed Yousuf, turning in towards middle, Yousuf moves back to wrist it past square leg and again, Rahim screams some thing.
on the middle and leg, he waits for the ball to come to him before turning it behind square leg
short delivery, turning in, Yousuf makes room to cut to sweeper cover
slower through the air, just outside off, pushed to cover point
slow again but pretty short, cut to sweeper cover
goes for the sweep to a delivery just outside leg and misses.
makes contact with his sweep this time and sends a delivery from outside off to the leg side for a single
low full toss, driven to long-off for a single
fuller, just outside off stump, turns in a little, guided to backward point region
leans forward to squeeze a full delivery turning away from him to backward point.

short one, goes on straight but Yousuf plays a rather neat flat-batted drive over the bowler's head. He made it look pretty easy, didn't get too excited at the short delivery, went back and picked his spot. Experience.
from round the stumos, full and on middle and leg, pushed towards long-on for a single
goes back to steer a  delivery to backward point
gets forward to ping the long-on for a single
flighted full, driven back to the bowler
full, flatter, just outside off, mistimes a drive to long-on for a single
full and flat again, again driven to long-on
leans forward to drive to long-off for a single
back to the bowler
outside off stump, driven to covers
shorter, pushed across Salman who backs away to cut it past point
full, straight, on the middle, wristed past square leg

Salman holes out to long-on. The innings was moving along in singles in the recent overs and he decides to up the ante but perishes in the process. It was tossed up outside off stump and Salman swung it on a bent knee to long-on.
short of length, outside off, steered to point
short of length, outside off, Yousuf decides to go for the pull but mistimes it high in the air but it lands safely over wide midwicket
tries to turn a length delivery to the leg side, misses and it hits the pad. Meanwhile, Nadal walks on to the centre court at Roland Garros. Now, Federer walks out as well. That should be some game.
leans forward to caress a full delivery through midwicket. Elegantly played. Easy on the eye.
outside off stump, on a length, punched back to the bowler
length delivery coming in towards off and middle, worked to right of mid-on for a single
goes right back to fist a full delivery past midwicket
rotates the strike back to Afridi with an on drive to long on
charges out, moving outside the leg stump in the process and digs out a real full delivery towards long-on
on the legs, turns to short fine leg
short of length, outside off stump, pulled to long on
turning delivery outside off, it comes slow off the track, Yousuf waits before cutting it to deep point
brings up his fifty with a flicked drive past square leg. How did he reach his fifty? I didn't even notice. Classy player.
strays down the leg side
on the pads, tickled to fine leg where Tamim Iqbal makes a fine sliding stop near the ropes.
shifts his line to outside off and driven to mid-off
walks across the stumps, Shahadat fires in a really full delivery on the middle stump line, flicked to fine leg
bangs in a bouncer, head-high and Yousuf pulls it to fine leg. He was a touch surprised at the bouncer but worked his wrists over time to get it down to the ground.
Afridi has started his job. He thrusts his front foot out, Shahadat digs it short and he pulls it ferociously to the cow corner - wide midwicket region.
shout for lbw but there was bat on it. He was on the front foot, trying to play a forcing stroke
waits for the turn to play out before pushing it to sweeper cover
rocks back to pull  a short delivery for a single
neat sweep shot. It was full, on the middle and off and Yousuf swept it to deep square leg boundary. There was a deep midwicket and a deep backward square leg and he bisected them
charges down the track to heave a delivery and inside-edges it past midwicket. Afridi has decided that everything has to go here.
from round the stumps, full and on leg and middle, flicked past square leg for couple of runs
down the track, moves outside leg and drives to long-off
Yousuf moves outside leg, doesn't come down the track but, waits for the ball to land before driving inside out to sweeper cover
fires it fast outside off, Afridi goes hard, gets an inside edge past leg stump
slows up the pace and it lands on a length and spins past Afridi who had gone for a big lofted shot and is beaten. Rahim whips the bails off but Afridi was inside the crease
shorter, outside off, cut to deep backward point region
cut to deep cover and that brings in Afridi on strike
Now then now then, Afridi has swung right into hands of deep midwicket. He went down on his knee and swung a full delivery straight to the fielder.
leans forward to defend a delivery on middle and leg and edges it to the pad
short, turning outside off stump, pulled to deep midwicket
leans forward to push to cover point

Kapali is the man of the moment. Another wicket. Big one too. Yousuf is gone. Flighted loopy delivery, turning away from Yousuf who tried to drive inside-out but hit it straight to covers. The ball dipped on him and he couldn't keep it down or get under it well enough to clear the fielder.
leans forward to defend to the off side
on the middle, pushed to the on side
flat and straight, can only push it to covers
full, straight and tapped back to the bowler. The stranglehold is on.
another dot ball as Malik drives to covers
ah! this one is down leg side
quick, short, cut to deep point
leans forward to defend to covers
short and wide as he sees the batsman coming out and Malik reaches out to cut past backward point
slightly short, mistimes a pull to midwicket

leans forward to push  a full and turning delivery close on the off side towards point. Ashraful rushes in, picks up and flicks a diving throw to the 
'keeper who breaks the stumps and Malik dives to make his crease. Had it been a direct hit, it would have been rather close
slightly short, cut to sweeper cover
stretches across to push to covers
lands short of length but it turns in sharply to hit the pad
slower through the air, outside off stump, top edges his sweep towards long leg
well outside off, short as well, cut to sweeper cover for a single
fuller, again outside off, dabbed to point region

Almost caught at long-on but it was too close to the ropes and it's palmed over the boundary. Misbah swung a full delivery high in the air and Raqibul stationed himself under the ball, arched back but the ball kept going behind and he jumped behind him and even if he had caught it it would have been a six as his feet landed outside the ropes
another swing and this time to wide midwicket region
goes down on his knee to slog sweep to long leg
moves well outside leg, Kapali fires it quicker and between the batsman and the stumps and Misbah fails to connect with his pull shot. Rahim is beaming.
worked past midwicket for a single.
comes down the track, slows up the pace, bowls outside off, Malik swoops, reaches out to cut it to the off side
goes back to push an off break back to the bowler
edged over the 'keeper's head. He went for a slog sweep to a full straight delivery on the off stump and gets a rather profitable edge
nice slower loopy delivery on the middle and leg, Misbah wanted to swing it over midwicket, misses and it bounds off the pad
No mistake this time. Cleanly hit slog sweep. He took out the front leg, went down on his knee and swung a flighted delivery over midwicket.
comes down the track, fired in quicker and shorter, Misbah adjusts to push it towards long-on and they run hard to come back for the second run
flighted delivery on middle, reverse swept for a single
low full toss, just outside off stump, pushed wide of long-off for couple of runs
slower one but it goes rapidly to the midwicket boundary. He waited for it and swung it cleanly on a bent knee. Nice looking stroke.

worked to midwicket for a quick single. There is a direct hit at the non-striker's end but he was inside the crease by then and they will go back for the second run as the ball ricochets of the stumps to long off
swing and a miss. Three more overs after this.
on a length, on the middle and off, mistimes his pull to the on side
yorker ends up a low full toss and Misbah takes care to take the front leg out of the line and on drives it past the diving midwicket fielder.

And in the middle, Malik has been cleaned up. He was struggling out there, unable to find his timing and has finally perished. He moved outside leg stump and tried to drive inside-out a full delivery but missed it completely.
gets forward to defend back down the track
slow through the air -he has varied his pace cleverly - defended to the off side
turns in, worked to midwicket
again takes the pace off the ball and he mistimes the cut shot to point

Misbah is done in by a good off cutter from Mortaza. The ball cut in from outside off, the bat came down outside the line and caught him in front. There was some noise as the ball passed the bat, Misbah suggests it might have been inside-edge but he is gone
outside the off stump, dabbed to third man
change of pace and he can't get his dab to third man working. Beaten outside off
offcutter, cut past point
another slower one, top edges a slog sweep to third man
Fawad Alam is done in by the slower one. He went for a slog sweep and skied it really high in the air and it came down into the hands of long-on
quick arm ball, he is beaten but was hit just outside leg stump. That was really quick delivery
The wickets are falling a heap now. Change of pace. It was slower through the air and Tanvir dragged it straight to midwicket
Dead plumb and Pakistan have been bowled out for 233. Arm ball - full and straight, the front leg was planted across and he couldn't get his bat around in time.

inn2.comm: on target, just outside off stump and left alone by Tamim
lands on a length, on the leg and middle line, tucked behind square leg
beaten outside off. It cut away from the stumps and he pushed at it
kicks up from short of length, jabbed to backward point
short of length and this time moving towards the hips, clipped to long leg for a single
fuller, on the middle and leg, tries to on drive and gets a leading edge to the off side

outside the off stump and is left alone. Tanvir was the star of the IPL. That whirring arms at release like fan blades and a nagging line and length, cutting one out and bringing the other in had the batsmen guessing.
strays down the leg side
beaten outside off. In the zone and Tamim  drives inside the line
probing delivery outside off, Tamim thinks about playing a shot before withdrawing his bat out of the line
this one comes in from outside off and driven past the bowler to the right of mid-on fielder
outside off and left alone. Good tight over, barring that wide down leg. Tanvir is on target here
full and angling away , left alone
almost dragged on to the stumps. It was on the off stump, no room but Nafees tries to cut it and gets an inside edge.
on a length, on the middle and leg, mistimes a drive and nicks it on to his pad

another edge. This one was full and on middle and leg line, he tried to drive across the line, got a leading edge and it landed past the non-striker. Neither the bowler or the mid-off fielder had any chance, though
cuts in to the batsman, gets past the prod and thuds into the thigh pad
short of length, slanting across, pushed to point
short of length, outside off stump and steered through point
goes down leg side
nice crashing cover drive. Full pitched outside off stump and he leaned across, got down on his knee to unfurl a full blooded drive. Fab shot that.
short of length, skids in from outside off stump, punched to the off side
in the zone outside off, left alone and Akmal shouts words of encouragement to Tanvir.
on a length, around off, pushed to mid-off.
tight line and length and he can only push it to mid-off
fuller, on middle and leg, worked through midwicket and they run really hard to come back for the third run.
again drifts to the pads and this time whipped to deep square leg region.
hurls across a bouncer and the square-leg umpire reckons, rightly, that it's too high
fuller, outside off stump, slashed to wide third man
drifts to the leg side now , turned to Tanvir at long leg.
tries to drive on the up - not the pitch for that kind of a stroke - and mistimes it towards mid-off
comes in with the angle, defended to the on side
leans across to defend a length delivery to covers
swing and a miss. Another length delivery outside off, he tries to carve it over the off side, bat meets air and ball flies to the 'keeper
Full pitched outside off and that's his zone; cover drive on a bent knee. Eye-catching
leans forward to drive to short cover
on a length, just outside off stump, dabbed to third man for a single
tries a slower one but slips it wide down leg side
leans forward to drive to mid-off
gets forward to the pitch of a really full pitched delivery and drives it to left of the diving Malik at mid-off. 202 to win now
on the off stump, off a length and edges his drive on to the pad. Afridi is warming up.
on the middle and leg, worked to midwicket region
short of length, kicks up on the middle, dabbed to point
length delivery around the off stump, driven to mid-off.
short of length, skids on towards off and middle, goes back to tap it close on the leg side and they rush across for a quick single
short of length, outside off stump, slashed to third man
slower one outside off stump, left alone
beaten on the cut outside off. A tad short in length but it came in to cramp him up.
similar delivery but this time he doesn't go for the cut but opens the bat-face and runs it down to right of third man
short of length, well outside off stump, cut and a miss
short of length, outside off stump, steered to point
Wahab strikes in his first over. Full, outside off, shaping away, Nafees tries to drive through covers and gets a thick edge through to Akmal
on a length, on the off stump, pushed to extra cover
on the middle and leg, length delivery and Ash tries to swing it to the leg side, misses and is hit on the pad
fuller, on the middle, Ash brings his bat down to defend to leg side
leans forward to push a full delivery to left of mid-on
slower one with loop in the air as Tamim creams it to cover where Younis does the fielding
outside the off stump, Tamim gets onto the backfoot and opens the face of the bat to run it down to third man for a single
Ash is like a cat on the hot tin roof because he wants to get off the mark as soon as possible and is struck on the pads
well now thats a bouncer, which hits him flush on the grill of the helmet
outside the off stump, Ash jabs it to third man for a single
short on the off stump, Ash looks to pull it away but cant get it past the fielder at midwicket
now goes to the off side as he gives fielding practice to cover fieldsman
outside the off stump, Ashraful has a swing and misses it
fuller in length on the middle stump, Ashraful has a defensive tap to mid off and takes a single
short outside the off stump, Tamim rocks back and looks to cut it away but misses the line of the delivery completely
fuller on the middle stump, Tamim comes onto the frontfoot and drives it down the ground with minimal fuss and minimal follow through. Looking pretty good is, Tamim
fuller on the middle stump again as Ashraful p;ushes it to mid off for a single and is well in time to beat the throw
outside the off stump, Tamim pushes it to point off the backfoot
short outside the off stump, Tamim cuts it but gets a bottom edge. Ball runs away to third man for a single
outside the off stump, Ashraful jabs it to third man for another single
outside the off stump, cut to third man for a single
on a good length outside the off stump, Ashraful opens the face ever so delicately and runs it down to third man for a single
begins with a wide delivery down the leg side as it beats Akmal too as the batsmen cross ends
on a good length outside the off stump, Tamim lunges forward and pushes it to short third man

Afridi loops it in the air and entices Tamim into playing the drive. Tamim is beaten by the spin and his back leg is in the air,  Akmal whips the bails off in a flash. Stumped or is it caught? The official scorers say it's a catch which means he probably got a nick to it as well. Now Afridi has 18 wickets for this calendar year
Afridi has almost got a second one as Raqibul pulls the bat out at the last moment and almost gets a leading edge
outside the off stump, Raqibul pushes it to cover on the frontfoot
fuller on the leg stump, pushes it back to Afridi
begins his new spell with a wide down the leg side
outside the off stump, Ashraful runs it down to third man for a single
short on the off stump, left alone by Raqibul
fuller outside the off stump, Raqibul drives but gets an outside edge to third man for a single
on a good length on the middle stump, Ashraful stands tall and defends it
strays down the leg stump, but is lucky that it clips the thigh pad on the way
on a good length on the off stump, Ashraful comes onto the frontfoot and defends to cover
outside off stump, slashed through the off side
lands outside off stump, turns away, cut to deep point
beaten outside off, turns away, slower through the air
short, spinning away, cut past point
from round the stumps, comes in off a length, slashed off the outer edge to third man boundary
hits the deck short of length, jumps in to evade the defensive poke and thuds into ribcage
fuller, on the middle, stays adjacent to the line ,jabs it off the inner edge to the leg side.
bangs it short, outside off, Ash calmly taps it to third man. Nicely played; he just got the bat horizontal and dabbed it away
short of length, coming in, defended to the on side
bangs it short and it goes down leg side

short of length, outside off, straightening a touch and a bit of bounce, Raqibul doesn't get close to the line and has a flash away from the body and it flew off the bat to Younis at a wide third slip position where he plucks a head-high catch to his left
flighted delivery loopy and turns away sharply past the defensive prod. Afridi is bowling really well here; mixing up pace and getting some turn
leans forward to defend to the off side
drives to covers
beaten by a super delivery. It was slow through the air, landed on middle and leg and spun sharply past the bat.
gets to the pitch to drive to the off side
quickish leg spin outside off stump, crouches to jab it to the point region.
from round the stumps, the left-arm bowler bowls outside off, cut to backward point
slow delivery well outside off, cut to deep backward point
moves outside left stump, punches to the off side
leans forward to drive through wide long-off region
well outside off stump, left alone
well outside off again, bordering on that wide line, Ash lets it go
spins away outside off stump, again big turn, tries to withdraw the bat but it runs off the face of the bat to point region

Afridi cleans him up with a quickish topspinner. It slid on straight and quick on the off stump line, a surprised Kapali tries to jam the bat down in a hurry but can only edge it back to his stumps. Afridi continues to impress with his variations. His bowling has got better and better these days
outside off stump, dabbed to backward point
beaten by a peachy legspinner and Akmal whips the bails off in a hurry. It was slower through the air, and spits past the outside edge.
loopy delivery on the stumps, jabbed to the leg side
the fuller one, almost yorking him and he just about manages to bring the bat down and get a edge
outside off stump, FAwad doesn't get much turn, driven to long-off
full and on the middle, turned to midwicket
really short delivery, cut to Misbah at extra cover. He should have put that one away
leans forward to drive to long-on
from wide of the crease, outside off stump, gets a bottom edge on to the ground and to Akmal

dropped by Gul at long-off. Tough chance, though. It was flighted delivery outside off stump, slow through the air and the batsman was early into his lofted drive. Gul ran forward and to his left and dived but couldn't get his palms under the ball in time
leans forward to push to the off side
on the middle stump line, turned to the leg side

Afridi thinks Misbah has taken a catch at short cover. Misbah is not sure and suggests to the umpire to consult third umpire. The umpires confer and say not out. It was loopy delivery outside off, driven uppishly towards short cover and Misbah dives forward and the ball was caught between his fingers and perhaps, it just bounced as he tried to squeeze it up.
well outside the off stump, wide
the quicker slider outside off, late cut to third man
short of length, cut to point
bit more air, outside off, full,. driven to sweeper cover
short of length outside off, cut past point
on a length, on the off stump, turned to the leg side
outside off stump, dabbed to short third man
comes down the track, reaches the pitch of a flighted delivery and drives to long-off
on the middle and leg, turned behind square leg
lands on a length on the middle, spins with bounce, cuts to point
goes right back to defend to off side
fuller, quicker and pushed back to the bowler
pushed back to the bowler
More displeasure from the Crowd as Rahim goes down the wicket and defends as the bowler drags back the length
pushed through the off side for a single
leans forward to drive to long-off
steps down and cuts a short of length delivery to sweeper cover
Ash pumps up some oxygen into the run chase with a pull. Poor short delivery, though and the crowd clear their throat.
fuller and driven to long-off
low dipping full toss and it's pushed to long-off
slower through the air, slightly short and pulled to right of long-on
fuller, pushed to Misbah at the straight cover position
well outside off, full and driven in the air towards sweeper cover. Nasir Jamshed, the sub, didn't pick it up at all
on the middle and off, defended to the off side. Arun Lal, on air, reckons Afridi cut the return crease on that and it should be a no ball
leans across to defend a full delivery to the off side.
long hop and is pulled to deep midwicket for just a single
moves outside leg and cuts a short delivery to sweeper cover
paddles a full delivery to fine-leg region
tries to charge down the track and Fawad fires it short and quick, pushed back to him
slow loopy dipping full toss, driven to Misbah at short cover
leans forward to drive to deep cover for a single
lands on the middle, turns, too full to cut as Rahim finds out; he manages to jab it away to the off side
sweeps for a single
full and outside off, driven to long-off
Rahim holes out to long-off. Another wicket for Afridi. He tossed it up full on the off and middle line, Rahim went for an inside-out lofted drive but hit straight to Tanvir
short and turning away, cut to left of sweeper cover for two runs. 100 up for Bangladesh.
slow flighted one and Ash defends to the off side. Hmm...
quicker one, punched to long-on
well outside off stump, cut through cover point
slow long hop, pulled to deep midwicket for a single
even slower, bigger long hop and Ashraful obliged to pull it away to deep midwicket boundary.
Fawad is either teasing and taunting Ash to hit out or he has just got bored. another short delivery, very short and this time outside off, cut to sweeper cover.
goes back to turn behind square leg and they run hard to come back for two runs
wide outside off stump and the umpire extends his arms
133.6 kmph delivery angling outside off stump, Ash gets beaten as he jabs at it
length delivery angling away, dabbed to third man
on a length, on the middle, turned to midwicket region
full and well outside off, Ash stands there and has a waft, misses. The bat hit the ground and the ball went to Akmal who doesn't collect it cleanly.
tries to heave a length delivery over midwicket, mistimes it for a single.

well outside off stump, swing and a miss. I thought I heard some sound as the ball passed the bat, thought it was a edge, but no one appealed. So obviously, there was no edge I guess. Must be voices in my head. Where is the doctor.
fullish, outside off, driven to deep cover
walks down the track, Gul fires in a short-pitched delivery, Ash edges a pull over midwicket.
bouncer but too high and it's a wide
went for a yorker, ended up as a low full toss but that was enough to do the damage. It swung in a touch and the bat came down outside the line. Timber!
yorker on the off stump, dug out to the off side
Length delivery that straightens outside off does the trick. The feet were going no where but the bat chased the ball. Edge and gone.
steered wide of third man for couple of runs
really full, trying for the yorker, outside off stump, Ashraful bends his knee and taps the ball to third man
short of length, outside off, guided to backward point
full and outside off, swing and yet another miss.
Bowled him! From round the stumps, it landed on a length outside off stump and cut in to beat the hurried prod and crashes into the leg stump.
bouncer and he ducks
short of length, coming in ,defended off the back foot
length delivery outside off, dabbed to third man
fullish, gets a inside edge on toe th pad
beaten on the defensive prod outside off. It straightened off a length
leans forward to defend to the off side
fuller and driven to covers
lifting delivery outside off, swayed away
fuller and pushed to the off side
leans forward to defend a length delivery
lifting delivery outside off stump, swayed away
leans forward to defend

Dropped by Akmal. well he didn't even reach it. He should have as it wasn't too far to his left. Gul had produced a jab and a edge wit ha delivery that straightened outside off stump from round the stumps and Akmal was late in reacting
outside off, slashed to third man
full toss and hit wide of midwicket for two runs
turns to midwicket region
turns to midwicket region
leans forward to drive to long on
full and on the stumps, swung through midwicket
banged in short and hooked away to the boundary.
leans forward to turn a length delivery to the leg side
low full toss, driven to long-on for a single
on the legs, turned past square leg
reaches his fifty with a drive through the off side. It has not been a fluent knock, he couldn't force the pace
rotates the strike with another drive
turned to short midwicket for a single
leans forward to push a full delivery to mid-on
leans forward to turn a full delivery through midwicket
short of length outside off dabbed to third man
slower one and he inside edges a drive on to the pad
fullish outside off and driven to right of mid-off
floated on the middle, worked to midwicket
clipped past square leg
short and outside off, cut past point
drilled to long on for another boundary
leans forward to defend
another forward defensive stroke.
and now dead-batted away. Hmm..
floated on the stumps, pushed to the off side
leans forward to defend and that's it Pakistan have earned a convincing win over the hosts
